projects.name: OrchestratorX
projects.description: Knowledge orchestrator rollout for customer app

conversations.user: We want to cut the Redwood orchestrator over to 100% traffic tonight. What final checklist should we run?
conversations.assistant: Use the OrchestratorX Redwood release checklist: confirm dual-write metrics are flat for 30 minutes, verify the automation watchers report healthy status, then run the smoke pack before flipping traffic. Capture the cmd_export output and attach it to the release note.

conversations.user: Search relevancy dipped after we ingested the compliance notes. How did we tune the rerank weights last time?
conversations.assistant: Raise memory_strength to 0.45, bump recency to 0.25, and drop bm25_score to 0.15. That balance favored canonical memories without losing the newest snippets. Document the change in search.py so the nightly consolidation job keeps the override.

conversations.user: Pager alerted on INC-310 for chunker timeouts again. What mitigation stays in place until the patch lands?
conversations.assistant: Keep the tokenizer fallback in streaming mode, cap chunker concurrency at four workers, and export the failing transcripts to the BugFixer vault so we can diff them against INC-204. The mitigation instructions live in the INC-310 notebook.

conversations.user: Remind me how to assemble the weekly trust report for the Obsidian vault without leaking drafts.
conversations.assistant: Run session_log_collector --window 7d, summarize with the local model, then call cmd_export --tag audit-weekly and drop the bundle into the review folder for approval. Do not sync until the reviewers sign off.
